Posts.Title: October 12th - Happy Birthday wishes to Puffin2014

Posts.Content: This was my first online user name from 1995. I had started ballroom dancing earlier that year and I came up with a unique spelling to make it mine. I use it everywhere!
Posts.Title: screen names-curuious if what they mean to everyone

Posts.Content: I used to have horses... Now our house has two dogs, two cats, and two rats! We had a bird on loan for a few months but she's gone home.
Posts.Title: screen names-curuious if what they mean to everyone

Posts.Content: My tumor was softer and smaller after the first treatment, too. And I've heard other stories of people who were given a low percentage of survival who survived. Without apricot seeds.
Posts.Title: Can anyone share their opinion or personal testimony of eating apricot seeds with cancer?

Posts.Content: Glad you came through surgery OK and are on the mend! Hugs!
Posts.Title: Surgery is done

Posts.Content: Congratulations on being in remission! I'm glad you found something that worked so well for you. However, please don't tell people that chemo doesn't stop cancer, because for many people it absolutely works. Chemo completely eradicated my 8cm tumor. While it would be great if no one ever had to have chemo again, I don't think the vast majority of oncologists are poisoning their patients for fun and profit. Their goal is to cure cancer. Thankfully, new research is being done all the time, and I predict there will be a safer, more pleasant, and more effective treatment protocol in just a few years.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative - No Chemo????

Posts.Content: Definitely get a second opinion, as we can only guess. Maybe he feels confident they got it all? Chemo is a lot of hell to go through it you don't have to.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative - No Chemo????

Posts.Content: That surprises me, because I was told to get extra protein. I can't imagine going through that and starving to boot.
